DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates the effect of aminoacid infusion on proteinturnover in muscle from cirrhosis subjects, compared to healthy controls. The hypothesis is that aminoacid infusion can attenuate the increase in proteindegradation that follows cirrhosis.
DOC.criteria: Male subjects Diagnosis of cirrhosis, ChildPugh A, B, C. Acute illness within 3 weeks Ascites collections within 10 days Heart, kidney, pulmonary disease. Cancer. Type 1 diabetes. Active alkoholdrinking
